title: Mainframe Automation API
description: Built a Python API service automating user and dataset management on mainframes, reducing over 400 manual incidents per year and enabling secure programmatic access.

title: Secure CI/CD Platform
description: Architected and deployed CI/CD environments serving multiple teams, fully compliant with enterprise security standards, enabling repeatable release automation and rollback strategies.

title: Cloud Deployment & Optimization
description: Optimized cloud workloads including container runtimes, storage management, and multi-environment delivery via GitLab CI and GKE clusters.
